name: Friend the Beast
body:
## Minecraft (Feed the Beast)

Our Feed the Beast Minecraft server is being generously hosted by James - thank you! If you run into any issues or have feedback about this content, [let us know!](https://github.com/mikebranski/friend-the-beast/issues)

### Vitals
Host: `65.26.247.183`  
Port: `25565` (Minecraft default, no need to specify)
Minecraft Version: 1.7.10  
Modpack: Direwolf20 v1.0.3

_Be sure to check out the installation below, as we have added some additional mods - namely ReactorCraft and RotaryCraft (zomg physics)!_

### Installing Additional Mods

Installation of the additional mods is easy, requiring one download and a config tweak.

1. Download a zip of the mods: <https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bxc6Fv7mZPG8LTA3SnJUZHFKNzQ/view> (thanks James!)
2. Extract the contents to the `direwolf20_17\minecraft\mods` where you installed FTB **-OR-** from the launcher you can [edit the modpack](http://ftbwiki.org/Tutorial:Installing_additional_mods) and add mods and it will move the files there.
3. Once this is done, start the game (this will create the configs, etc). **Note:** it will crash this time.
4. Now, open the `ReactorCraft.cfg` file located in the `direwolf20_17\minecraft\config\Reika` directory.
5. Locate the line `I:"Radiation Effect ID"=31` at the end of the file and change the ID from 31 to 82.
6. Save and close the config file.

That's it! Launch the game again and you're all set. See you topside.

### Etiquette

tl;dr: This is a friendly server, so keep trolling to a minimum and have fun. Don't be a dick, m'kay?

### Cast

arswrath - Keith  
Fakuma - James  
goforlava - Mike  
kolpage - Tony
